dashboard.label: Home - Red Hat Insights
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_7Gb6srLQ":{"type":"viz.img","options":{"preserveAspectRatio":true,"src":"/static/app/redhat-insights/Logo-RedHat-A-Color-RGB.png"}},"viz_nTiBDZr5":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Insights","fontSize":36,"fontWeight":"bold"}},"viz_8AIlN5l1":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Get full information on your Red Hat Insight Console, "},"eventHandlers":[]},"viz_lRkSMKyF":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"click here. ","textColor":"#0877a6"},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.customUrl","options":{"url":"https://console.redhat.com","newTab":true}}]},"viz_kkiAnuCX":{"type":"splunk.table","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_RP9bpOc1"},"title":"Drifted machines"},"viz_IHCr226A":{"type":"viz.pie","title":"Total / Drifted Machines","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_RP9bpOc1"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_RP9bpOc1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"event_type = "drift" AND NOT _raw | 
 eval mytime=strftime(_time,"%m-%d-%Y %l:%M:%S %p") | 
 fields account_id, mytime, "context.display_name", "context.inventory_id", "payload.baseline_name" |
 fields - _* | 
 rename account_id as "Account ID", mytime as "Time", context.display_name as "System", context.inventory_id as "Inventory ID", payload.baseline_name as "Baseline Name""},"name":"Search_Drift_Home"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","showTitleAndDescription":false},"structure":[{"item":"viz_7Gb6srLQ","type":"block","position":{"x":340,"y":0,"w":560,"h":240}},{"item":"viz_nTiBDZr5","type":"block","position":{"x":770,"y":150,"w":300,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_8AIlN5l1","type":"block","position":{"x":260,"y":270,"w":570,"h":90}},{"item":"viz_lRkSMKyF","type":"block","position":{"x":820,"y":270,"w":130,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_kkiAnuCX","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":360,"w":600,"h":300}},{"item":"viz_IHCr226A","type":"block","position":{"x":650,"y":360,"w":410,"h":300}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp"]},"description":"","title":"Home - Red Hat Insights"}
